title: Rain Extinguishing the Flames at the Stake to Which King Kroesus is Bound
description: Rain Extinguishing the Flames at the Stake to Which King Kroesus is Bound; Unknown; Paris, France; about 1405; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with dark red morocco; Leaf: 36.7 x 26 cm (14 7/16 x 10 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 7, fol. 42; J.
